name: Leveraging Social Resistance Movements
description: Empowering grassroots movements to resist and replace PSN-controlled institutions.

cards.title: Covertly Organizing Counter-Movements
cards.description: Seeding and guiding social movements without exposing leadership roles.
bulletpoints: Establishing decentralized leadership models to prevent infiltration.
Creating overlapping networks of resistance cells that operate independently.
Using encrypted communications to coordinate actions securely.

cards.title: Economic Warfare Through Boycotts and Parallel Systems
cards.description: Undermining PSN economic control by shifting financial power.
bulletpoints: Encouraging mass financial withdrawals from PSN-controlled banks.
Building alternative economic systems that bypass traditional institutions.
Disrupting PSN revenue streams by organizing coordinated boycotts.

cards.title: Replacing PSN-Controlled Governance Structures
cards.description: Constructing new, independent systems of governance to supersede PSN rule.
bulletpoints: Forming independent councils and legal structures outside their jurisdiction.
Building self-sufficient communities that reject centralized authority.
Developing digital governance models that resist external control.
